comment:
Started with 8 gallons of water, used 5 gallons in Mash. Mash went from 152ºF to 146ºF in 1.6 hours. Used Super Alpha (Dr. Rudi) 12.9% Alpha Acid hops. Added Basil after hand crushing in mesh bag at flame out. Air temp was about 88ºF. Did not add hops until wort dropped to 12ºPlato (30 minutes). 12.8º Plato after 45 minute boil.
Pitched yeast at 77ºF. Collected about 6.25 gallons of beer.
